content: this hat is something i wanted to knit for myself based on one of my old hats from way back when this green hat was one of my first keep-forever hats that i picked up in a charity shop in southend it s made of something rather chunky and acrylic and i love it **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/2776756 **yarn** 100-130 yards/91-119 m aran weight yarn **needles & notions** set 5 5mm/uk5/us9 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **gauge** 16sts x 24rows to 4in/10cm over stocking stitch **sizes** to fit size 19 21 23 in/48 25 53 25 58 5 cm finished size 16 18 20 in/40 75 45 75 51 cm **sample details** shown in manos del uruguay wool clasica 138yd/126m per 100g 100% wool shown in size 23in/58 5cm on model with 21 75in/55 25cm circumference head **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round increases & decreases specialist cast-on **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour published 2013 product code ww241fthrifterbeanie
